author: Agnieszka Pikulicka-Wilczewska
title: Russia’s crackdown on Crimean Tatars foreshadows wider repression
description: Analysts say Russia’s repression of Crimean Tatars indicates likely tactics towards dissent in wider Ukraine.
content:
At 6am on Thursday, a group of seven Russian soldiers raided Leila Ibragimovas home in Melitopol in southeastern Ukraine.
Ibragimova, an ethnic Crimean Tatar, is a well-known figure in the city, whi… [+4824 chars]
